pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, October 17, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus Meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs Chrystia Freeland will meet with Global Affairs Canadaâ€™s Trade Policy and Negotiations Branch.

Confederation Room
John G. Diefenbaker Building
111 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:  

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should present themselves to the Algonquin Room no later than 4:00 p.m.
